title: need 14 rp pls lel
body: i've been mystery gifting with my friend but unfortunately I'm 14 rp short off of a mystery gift :c it would be awesome if i could be given that 14 extra rp <3 maybe my mate will get pulsefire ezreal :p

replies.body: in 2 weeks or so ill gift u it mang
If you message riot support they have actually been know to hand RP out in exchange for art or silly songs
